description:
Trying to detach a attached volume is not working with Nova 2012.2 using the latest python-cinderclient 1.0.0 from PyPi. There is no entry in nova/tools/pip-requires for python-cinderclient, so version 1.0.0 should work..?

2012-11-05 12:17:48 ERROR nova.api.openstack [req-67c97918-c76f-4b96-80f3-a1b1404f0aea 5d795ef6a803425e902922bb8f817828 5536f9774f2f42f4a5d4bbc47a484ae8] Caught error: 'VolumeManager' object has no attribute 'begin_detaching'
2012-11-05 12:17:48 TRACE nova.api.openstack Traceback (most recent call last):
2012-11-05 12:17:48 TRACE nova.api.openstack   File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages/nova/api/openstack/__init__.py", line 78, in __call__

2012-11-05 12:17:48 TRACE nova.api.openstack   File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages/webob/request.py", line 1053, in get_response
2012-11-05 12:17:48 TRACE nova.api.openstack     application, catch_exc_info=False)
2012-11-05 12:17:48 TRACE nova.api.openstack   File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages/webob/request.py", line 1022, in call_application

2012-11-05 12:17:48 TRACE nova.api.openstack   File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages/webob/dec.py", line 159, in __call__
2012-11-05 12:17:48 TRACE nova.api.openstack     return resp(environ, start_response)
2012-11-05 12:17:48 TRACE nova.api.openstack   File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages/keystone/middleware/auth_token.py", line 278, in __call__
2012-11-05 12:17:48 TRACE nova.api.openstack     return self.app(env, start_response)
2012-11-05 12:17:48 TRACE nova.api.openstack   File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages/webob/dec.py", line 159, in __call__
2012-11-05 12:17:48 TRACE nova.api.openstack     return resp(environ, start_response)
2012-11-05 12:17:48 TRACE nova.api.openstack   File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages/webob/dec.py", line 159, in __call__
2012-11-05 12:17:48 TRACE nova.api.openstack     return resp(environ, start_response)

2012-11-05 12:17:48 TRACE nova.api.openstack   File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages/webob/dec.py", line 147, in __call__
2012-11-05 12:17:48 TRACE nova.api.openstack     resp = self.call_func(req, *args, **self.kwargs)
2012-11-05 12:17:48 TRACE nova.api.openstack   File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages/webob/dec.py", line 208, in call_func

2012-11-05 12:17:48 TRACE nova.api.openstack     content_type, body, accept)

2012-11-05 12:17:48 TRACE nova.api.openstack AttributeError: 'VolumeManager' object has no attribute 'begin_detaching'
2012-11-05 12:17:48 TRACE nova.api.openstack
title: detaching of volumes not working with latest cinderclient

comments.content:
Trying to detach a attached volume is not working with Nova 2012.2 using the latest python-cinderclient 1.0.0 from PyPi. There is no entry in nova/tools/pip-requires for python-cinderclient, so version 1.0.0 should work..?

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~berendt

comments.content: Wrong version of python-cinderclient on nova-api system. After upgrading to version 1.0.0 everything is working like expected.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~berendt
